bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Upper Gold Mine Church was organized in 1829.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These minutes cover the period from 18 January 1845 to [20] July 1873. References are made to an earlier record book, and on page 88 the last entry for these minutes is the note: "See New Minute Book." This microfilm copy also includes loose pages variously numbered between 312-360 containing membership lists and records of contributions. A transcription of the church constitution adopted in 1829 is located in the front of the book.
